description:
Skills:
  • Experience working with creators/influencers at a creator agency OR product/operations with a creator platform product.
  • 1+ years of professional working experience
  • Bilingual in Mandarin not required but a huge plus, as this hire will be interacting with Algorithm Engineers in China from time to time
  • 1-2 years of experience in a creator agency or a product role within digital advertising or creator/influencer marketing.
  • Self-starter with strong project management skills. Ability to grasp core context, identify key risks, and collaborate with all parties to achieve goals in a fast-changing environment.
  • Attention to detail, ensuring high standards of quality and accuracy in all aspects of deliverables.
  • Strong communicator and team player. Comfortable navigating global organizational structures and aligning objectives with cross-functional teams. Thrives in a diverse work environment.
  • Analytical, data-sensitive, and goal-driven. Comfortable with setting ambitious targets, analyzing the status quo, planning a course of action, executing rapid trial-and-error iterations, and constantly improving

Responsibilities:

  • Provide white-glove service by collaborating with algorithms to select and match suitable creators for key advertiser campaigns
  • Train algorithms with negative case examples to enhance overall accuracy and performance
  • Conduct algorithm labeling by evaluating the relevance of search results and assist in building reverse test datasets to guide optimization iterations
  • Offer troubleshooting support for client queries regarding creator joining and submission status
  • Regularly compile and report issues and product requests related to matching and troubleshooting to improve SOPs and provide a basis for product iterations
  • Influence the product strategy and roadmap by working closely with Product and Algorithm teams to ensure alignment with business goals and client needs.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Advanced knowledge of the creator economy, with experience working directly with talent agencies and/or creator marketplace platforms
  • Prior experience influencing product development and strategy within a tech or digital advertising company.
